sentence: The downtown Sheraton is conveniently located near the freeway in walking distance of activities like the market movie theater food and bars
Centrally located in downtown Phoenix and close to attractions such as museums and sports venues
Another great asset is the fitness room one of the best I have encountered at a hotel
There is a great workout facility and outdoor pool on the 4th floor
The location of this hotel is ideal for activities in the area and it is close to shopping and restaurants
The workout facilities were very good with plenty of cardio equipment as well as weight machines and a variety of dumbbells
Beautiful rooms and awesome gym
Half mile to the sports stadiums even less to convention center
Good room good gym
Close to everything the rooms are huge and the gym is big and nicely situated close to the pool action
Only down side was water being shut off for several hours during mid morning to mid afternoon especially on a Sunday when outdoor activities were going on
The facilities as gym pool etc are a bit expensive but good
It was poor timing on our part to be there when the girls volleyball playoffs were at the Event Center next door
We went to use the pool for our afternoon float before dinner and it was full of volleyball players
There were noisy maintenance activities going on the upper floors water supply was stopped every day for several hours
Thus held an activity for the students which was nice but the adults did not have enough seating
There are no showers by the pool or fitness area
While it is not an issue relative to the hotel itself we found out that many of the better restaurants attractions outside of certain sports attractions are at least a car ride away

The roof top pool spa lounge area is also nice however because there are not too many places to go and hang out within the hotel due to this renovation process this area was very crowded the noise level very high and seating very limited
If you are a sports fan it is walking distance from the Suns and Diamond Backs stadium
